{{Infobox football tournament season | title = Copa del Rey | year = 1912 | other_title = | image = | imagesize = | caption = | country = Spain | num_teams = 4 | defending champions = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | champions = [[FC Barcelona]] | runner-up = [[Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica EspaÃ±ola|Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica]] | matches = 3 | goals = 8 | top goal scorer = | player = | prevseason = [[1911 Copa del Rey|1911]] | nextseason = [[1913 Copa del Rey|1913]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1912''' was the 10th edition of the [[Copa del Rey]]. The competition started on March 31, 1912 and concluded on April 12, 1912 with the Final, held at the [[Estadi de la IndÃºstria|Industria Stadium]] in [[Barcelona]], in which [[FC Barcelona]] lifted the trophy for the second time ever with a 2â0 victory over [[Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica EspaÃ±ola|Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica]].
